history.content: The College of Engineering is not yet using the degree report. Please contact your ESS Advisor with this concern, as it's not specific to this department.

I have seen previous posts on this topic and was still a little confused.

I am a fourth year EECS major and I am kind of confused by how the senior residency requirement works.

It states that 'The final two semesters and 30 units must be completed in residence in the College of Engineering on the Berkeley campus in two consecutive semesters.'

Does that mean the the last two semesters I need to take 30 units?? Or is the last 30 not restricted to only the last two semesters? I've only been taking the minimum so far, so I only have like 24 units in the last two semesters. Checking the degree report, this is the only requirement I don't satisfy:
history.subject: CoE Senior Residency Requirement
